# Load Libraries

```{r libs}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(janitor)

```


# Load Data

```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2026-02-17')

dataset <- tuesdata$dataset

```

# Data Wrangling

```{r}
plot_dat <- 
  dataset |> 
  filter(toupper(measure) %in% c("TOTAL SHEEP", "TOTAL CATTLE", "TOTAL PIGS", "TOTAL GOATS", "TOTAL LAMBS", "TOTAL AREA OF FARMS")) |> 
  select(year_ended_june, measure, value) |> 
  pivot_wider(names_from = "measure", values_from = "value") |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  mutate(across(c(total_sheep, total_cattle, total_pigs, total_goats), ~ if_else(is.na(.x), 0, .x))) |> 
  filter(!is.na(total_area_of_farms)) |> 
  mutate(sheep_density = total_sheep / total_area_of_farms, cattle_density = total_cattle / total_area_of_farms, pig_density = total_pigs/total_area_of_farms, goat_density = total_goats/total_area_of_farms)

```
